name: api_physics2d_Physics2D
description: Provides utilities and global settings to manage and simulate 2D physics interactions, such as collision detection and raycasting.

properties.name: BoxCast
properties.description: Casts a box against Colliders in the Scene, returning the first Collider to contact with it.

properties.name: BoxCastAll
properties.description: Casts a box against Colliders in the Scene, returning all Colliders that contact with it.

properties.name: CapsuleCast
properties.description: Casts a capsule against Colliders in the Scene, returning the first Collider to contact with it.

properties.name: CapsuleCastAll
properties.description: Casts a capsule against Colliders in the Scene, returning all Colliders that contact with it.

properties.name: CircleCast
properties.description: Casts a circle against Colliders in the Scene, returning the first Collider to contact with it.

properties.name: CircleCastAll
properties.description: Casts a circle against Colliders in the Scene, returning all Colliders that contact with it.

properties.name: ClosestPoint
properties.description: Returns a point on the perimeter of the Collider that is closest to the specified position.

properties.name: Distance
properties.description: Calculates the minimum distance between two Colliders.

properties.name: GetContacts
properties.description: Retrieves all Colliders in contact with the Collider.

properties.name: GetIgnoreCollision
properties.description: Checks whether the collision detection system will ignore all collisions/triggers between collider1 and collider2 or not.

properties.name: GetIgnoreLayerCollision
properties.description: Checks whether collisions between the specified layers be ignored or not.

properties.name: GetLayerCollisionMask
properties.description: Get the collision layer mask that indicates which layer(s) the specified layer can collide with.

properties.name: GetRayIntersection
properties.description: Cast a 3D ray against the 2D Colliders in the Scene.

properties.name: GetRayIntersectionAll
properties.description: Cast a 3D ray against the 2D Colliders in the Scene.

properties.name: IgnoreCollision
properties.description: Makes the collision detection system ignore all collisions/triggers between collider1 and collider2.

properties.name: IgnoreLayerCollision
properties.description: Choose whether to detect or ignore collisions between a specified pair of layers.

properties.name: IsTouching
properties.description: Checks whether the passed Colliders are in contact or not.

properties.name: IsTouchingLayers
properties.description: Checks whether the Collider is touching any Colliders on the specified layerMask or not.

properties.name: Linecast
properties.description: Casts a line segment against Colliders in the Scene.

properties.name: LinecastAll
properties.description: Casts a line against Colliders in the Scene.
